recommendations: Fix legacy test import paths to use current src module locations
Add missing dev dependencies used only by tests (e.g., @faker-js/faker)
Provide JWT tokens or mock auth for protected controllers in e2e tests
Increase Jest timeout for heavy module initialization; or run targeted e2e via dedicated config
Scope unit tests to modules with validated schemas; stub external services to avoid DB/Redis dependencies
Add k6/Artillery scripts for load testing with resource metrics collection
